edu.iu.dsc.tws.api

Class Twister2Job

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.dsc.tws.api.Twister2Job

  • public final class Twister2Job
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a Twister2Job. This class can be used to configure a job along with its resource. Every job should have a name and a IWorker class. Twister2JobBuilder is used for creating and configuring the job object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Twister2Job.Twister2JobBuilder
      Builder class for creating the job.
